citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am on
1/15/2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by telephone and he reported that both he and his wife were working and
would not be available before 4:30 PM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am on 
1/15/2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by telephone and he reported that both he and his wife were working and 
would not be available before 4:30 PM. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
